messageScreen.warningDesc2: Only when transacting through the Helpt system are both the Client and Helper are fully protected by Helpt. When the payment is taken offsite it is impossible for us to assist you when something goes wrong.

postReview.questionForClient: How well did they perform the job?

addressForm.whyNeedMyAddress: Why Do You Need My Address?
addressForm.answerToWhy: Don’t worry – we won’t be sharing this with anyone! we need it so we can find job opportunities close to you.

deactivation.title: Deactivate Your Account
deactivation.desc: Please describe in the box below why you would like to deactivate your account. You will be emailed if your deactivation is approved by our team.
deactivation.placeholder: Why would you like to deactivate your Helpt account?
deactivation.reviewing: You will be emailed if your deactivation is approved by our team

accountBlocked.desc: Your account has been flagged as inappropriate and you will no longer be able to use our service.
accountBlocked.desc2: It looks like your account has been deactivated because of poor reviews.  You can submit a reactivation request by filling in the fields below.
accountBlocked.question1forClient: It appears you have received many poor reviews from Helpt® Helpers. Why do you think this is the case?
accountBlocked.question1forHelper: It appears you have received many poor reviews from Helpt® Clients. Why do you think this is the case?
accountBlocked.question2forClient: If you are approved for reactivation, how do you plan on preventing something like this in the future?
accountBlocked.question2forHelper: If you are approved for reactivation, how do you plan on providing better service in the future?
accountBlocked.question3forBoth: Is there anything else we should take into consideration for us to make a decision?
accountBlocked.thanksDesc: We’ll let you know when a decision has been made.
